
## Fit a logistic regression model to the binary-classifier-data.csv dataset
```{r}
label_glm <- glm(label~., data=binary_data, family = binomial(link = "logit"))
summary(label_glm)
```
```{r}
response_label_glm <- predict(label_glm, type='response')
label_prediction <- table(Actual_Value = binary_data$label, Predicted_Value = response_label_glm > .5)
label_prediction
```
## What is the accuracy of the logistic regression classifier?
```{r}
label_accuracy <- ((label_prediction[[1,1]] + label_prediction[[2,2]]) / sum(label_prediction))
label_accuracy
```
